text: Nhung nguoi o lai (khong tham chien) se noi khi thay cac nguoi đi thu nhat chien loi pham: “Hay cho chung toi đi theo cac nguoi.” Chung muon thay đoi Loi Phan cua Allah. Nguoi hay bao chung: “Cac nguoi đung bao gio theo bon ta! Allah đa phan nhu the cho cac nguoi tu truoc.” Nhung chung lai bao: “Khong, cac nguoi ganh ti voi chung toi.” Khong, chung chang hieu gi ngoai tru mot chut it
